name: Pong (itch) (Dorcat)
description:
A recreation of pong, plain and simple.

Has Player vs Player and Player vs AI.

There is two AI Modes, Standard and Impossible.

Impossible might actually be impossible, maybe try prove me wrong.

The AI doesn't cheat and is the same as a Player.

Made as part of my project where I recreate retro games and then try and make a modern take on the same game. My progress is on this spreadsheet along with links to all recreated and reimagined games! [Retro Recreations Spreadsheet]
